question: Provide all civil engineers and architects with expertise in AutoCAD.
sql_query1:
SELECT Civil_Engineers.name
FROM Civil_Engineers
WHERE Civil_Engineers.design_software_expertise = "AutoCAD"
UNION
SELECT Architects.name
FROM Architects
WHERE Architects.design_software_expertise = "AutoCAD"
sql_query2:
SELECT Civil_Engineers.name
FROM Civil_Engineers
UNION
SELECT Architects.name
FROM Architects
WHERE Architects.design_software_expertise = "AutoCAD"
interpretation1: Show both the civil engineers and architects with expertise in AutoCAD.
interpretation2: Show all the civil engineers and whichever architects have expertise in AutoCAD.
